title: Midara na Nettaigyo
sinopse:
Eri, used to be a competitive swimmer in high school and now works for a men's magazine. She suddenly transfers to the editorial department of a women's magazine and becomes an assistant to a guy who does things his own way and is really pompous. They clash a lot, but Eri experiences his true kindness and...?

(Source: MU)

Included one-shots:
Volume 7: Romance ni Kugitsuke, Romance ni Michizure
